code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductSearch(){const[product,setProduct]=useState("");const[results,setResults]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSearch=async()=>{if(!product)return;setLoading(true);try{const response=await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/compare?product=${product}`);setResults(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data",error);setResults([]);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 max-w-md mx-auto text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Price Comparison"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:product,onChange:e=>{e.target.value;},placeholder:"enter product value...",className:"border p-2 rounded w-full mb-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSearch,className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Search"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-4",children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-4 space-y-4",children:results.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border p-4 rounded shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-bold",children:item.source}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-green-600 font-semibold",children:item.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:item.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"text-blue-600 underline",children:["View on ",item.source]})]},index))})]});}export default ProductSearch;
